text: #TRdiq <4zu <TTHf gfearut ThHi9 Phone 91-11-25074100/25074200 (@a WRa7, 73+ 9aa7 &< TToT 77Tq4) 444 / Fax 91-11-25093507 25093514 National Highways Authority of India QA_ Extn:: 2223 2318 2468 2553 (Ministry of Shipping, Road Transport and Highways) 0if-5 @ 6, 110, ETGT; 7$ favrit-110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka; New Delhi-110075 NHAI/13013/CMD-CO/ Tolling Options , 11-12 19.04.2011 CIRCULAR NO: NHAILCOMMERCIALOPERATIONS 130 Sub:- Departmental collection of User Fee_by the PDs 1_ This circular is issued in partial modification of earlier guidelines issued vide letter no_ NHAI/ 13013/10-11/Tolling Options/CMD- CO/Vol.II/ 12365 dt 24 June 2010 and letter No NHAI/ 13013/CMD- cO/Tolling Options/08-09/13481 dt 17 August 2010 and other instructions on this subject; 2 The committee for  selection of a man power  supplying agency for fee collection in case of Public Funded and BOT Annuity projects till engagement of fee collecting agency through competitive bidding process will be as follows; 1) CGM-RO (concerned) Chairman of the Committee ii) PD concerned Member Secretary, iii) PD of adjacent PIU/CMU Member (To be nominated by RO) iv) Manager (F) Member (To be nominated by RO) 3. The committee will consider the following points while manpower: i) Applications will be invited by the RO Concerned) for all the toll plazas within his jurisdiction. Application will be   received both at Regional Office and at the Office of the concerned Project Director ii) Necessary advertisement shall be given in the local news papers by the concerned PD. iii) Manpower can be hired from any security/ other man power supplying agencies: iv) Such   agencies must  have PF and ESI  registrations number and labour license for more than 100 workers, and be preferably registered within the State in which Plaza is located_ The agencies must have experience of toll collection of at least one assignment for at least three months vi) Engagement of 50% ex servicemen out of total manpower to-be hired be ensured: vii) The minimum wages at which manpower is hired must not be below the minimum wages of the State/ Central Government: viii) The   qualification and   experience of the manpower to be engaged should be as per the enclosed statement at Annex A: ix) Since there  may be more   than one agency  fulfilling  above stated criteria/ benchmark, selection may be done giving preference to the Z:IGM(COJIDGMCO)Tolling Options Vol _~ILdoc q 'HT { 7 91 NHAL qazr- hiring 2041 To
